On this Episode of Open at Microsoft, we are showing the new Dapr Durable AI Agent Workflow Framework. As developers push the boundaries of AI-driven automation, the challenge of orchestrating and managing autonomous agents at scale becomes increasingly complex. Dapr Agents is an open-source framework that dramatically lowers the creation of production ready agentic systems, powered by the CNCF Dapr's distributed application runtime, used by thousands of enterprises today in mission critical services. By combining LLM-driven reasoning with Dapr‚Äôs virtual actor model, pub/sub messaging, and stateful workflows, Dapr Agents enables developers to build intelligent, scalable, and fault-tolerant multi-agent systems.

If you're interested in building intelligent, scalable, and resilient agentic systems, this episode equips you with the knowledge to easily build these.
